inkball

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
      • inkball.Tile
        • inkball.Wall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorRestrictingWall

    public class Wall
extends Tile
    Represents a wall tile in the InkBall game. Walls can collide with balls and change their direction or color.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class inkball.Tile

        bottomLeftCorner, bottomRightCorner, HALF_SIZE, topLeftCorner, topRightCorner

        public boolean collidesWithBall(Ball ball)
        Checks if the ball collides with this wall.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if collision occurs, false otherwise.
